PAGE.TITLE: Something went wrong.
PAGE.ACCESS_DENIED: You do not have access to this page.
PAGE.NOT_FOUND: Page not found. Maybe you have the wrong address or it has been moved.

LOGIN_COULDNT_FOUND_USER: There is no user with this login.
INTERNAL_SERVER_ERROR: A server error has occurred. Please try again
AUTH_RESET_USER_HAVENT_PGP: This user does not have a PGP key
AUTH_RESET_UNCORRECT_USER_PGP: This user has the wrong PGP key
SIGN_UP_USERNAME_ALREADY_EXISTS: User with the same login or nickname already exists
ACCOUNT_BALANCE_IS_EMPTY: Your account balance must not be empty
SHOP_USER_NO_ACCESS: You do not have access to this shop
PRODUCT_WITH_PATH_ALREADY_EXISTS: Product with this URL already exists
SHOP_WITH_PATH_ALREADY_EXISTS: A shop with this URL already exists
undefined: An error occured, please try again
USER_WITH_THIS_ID_NOT_FOUND: User with this ID was not found
SHOP_MEMBER_EXISTS: The user is already a member of the shop
SHOP_MEMBER_IS_OWNER: The user is the owner of the store
UPLOAD_FILES_EMPTY_SLOT_LIMIT: The limit on the amount of free space for downloading files has been exceeded. Delete one or more files
